products.name: Cast Iron Dosa Tawa
products.description: Perfect for making crispy dosas with authentic taste. This premium 30cm cast iron dosa tawa ensures even heat distribution and adds natural iron to your food.
products.detailedDescription: Our flagship 30cm Cast Iron Dosa Tawa is the perfect companion for making authentic South Indian dosas. Crafted from premium cast iron, this tawa provides superior heat retention and even distribution, ensuring your dosas cook perfectly every time. The pre-seasoned surface becomes naturally non-stick with use, making it easy to flip and serve crispy, golden dosas. Each use adds trace amounts of iron to your food, supporting healthy nutrition naturally.
features: Even heat distribution across the entire surface
Pre-seasoned with natural oils for immediate use
Iron fortification adds nutrients to your food
Develops natural non-stick properties over time
Compatible with gas, electric, and induction cooktops

products.name: Cast Iron Roti Tawa
products.description: Ideal for soft rotis and chapatis with perfect browning
products.detailedDescription: Create the softest, most flavorful rotis with our 26cm Cast Iron Roti Tawa. The flat, smooth surface ensures even cooking while the cast iron material retains heat beautifully, giving you perfectly puffed rotis every time. The natural iron content enriches your daily bread with essential nutrients.
features: Flat surface design for perfect roti cooking
Compact 26cm size perfect for daily use

products.name: Cast Iron Paniyaram Pan
products.description: Make 12 perfectly shaped paniyarams at once
products.detailedDescription: Traditional South Indian cooking made easy with our 12-pit Paniyaram Pan. Each pit is perfectly shaped to create uniform, round paniyarams that cook evenly. Whether you're making sweet or savory varieties, this pan ensures consistent results every time.
features: 12 perfectly shaped pits for uniform cooking
Even heat distribution to all pits
Suitable for both sweet and savory preparations

products.name: Cast Iron Kadai
products.description: Versatile kadai for all your cooking needs
products.detailedDescription: Our 24cm Cast Iron Kadai is the ultimate multi-purpose cooking vessel. From deep frying samosas to cooking curries, this kadai handles it all with superior heat retention and even cooking. The deep, curved design makes it perfect for Indian cooking techniques.
features: Curved bottom design for efficient cooking

products.name: Cast Iron Dosa Tawa
products.detailedDescription: Perfect for smaller families or compact kitchens, our 26cm Cast Iron Dosa Tawa delivers the same authentic taste and health benefits in a more manageable size. Ideal for couples or small families who want traditional cast iron cooking.
features: Quick heating due to smaller size

products.name: Cast Iron Concave Tawa
products.description: Special concave design for unique cooking
products.detailedDescription: Our Concave Tawa features a unique curved design that prevents oil pooling and provides versatile cooking options for various Indian breads and dishes. The concave surface makes it ideal for making chapatis that puff up perfectly.

products.name: Cast Iron Skillet
products.detailedDescription: Compact yet powerful, our 15cm Cast Iron Skillet is ideal for small portions, individual servings, and precise cooking tasks. Despite its small size, it delivers the same excellent heat retention and cooking performance as our larger pieces.

products.name: Cast Iron Kadai
products.detailedDescription: Featuring an ergonomically designed curved handle, this kadai provides better grip and reduced fatigue during cooking sessions. The thoughtful design makes it comfortable to use for extended periods while maintaining all the benefits of cast iron cooking.

products.name: Cast Iron Tadka Pan
products.detailedDescription: A must-have for every Indian kitchen, our small Tadka Pan is perfect for tempering spices and preparing small portions. The compact size heats up quickly and evenly, making it ideal for creating aromatic tadkas that enhance your dishes.

products.name: Cast Iron WH Dosa Tawa
products.detailedDescription: Combining traditional cast iron benefits with modern ergonomic design, our Premium White Handle Dosa Tawa features a heat-resistant white handle for comfortable grip and professional appearance. Perfect for both home cooks and professional kitchens.
features: Premium white handle for comfortable grip

products.name: Cast Iron WH Roti Tawa
products.detailedDescription: Perfect for daily roti making with the added comfort of our signature white handle design. The elegant appearance makes it suitable for both cooking and serving, while the ergonomic handle ensures comfortable use.

products.name: Cast Iron WH Kadai
products.description: Large kadai with premium white handle
products.detailedDescription: Our largest premium kadai perfect for family cooking with the comfort of heat-resistant white handles. The generous size makes it ideal for preparing meals for larger families or entertaining guests.

products.name: Cast Iron WH Kadai
products.detailedDescription: Perfect size for small families with all the premium features and comfortable white handle design. The compact size makes it easy to handle while still providing excellent cooking performance.

products.name: Cast Iron WH Wok
products.detailedDescription: Traditional wok design with modern white handle comfort, perfect for high-heat stir-frying and Asian cooking techniques. The deep, curved shape allows for efficient tossing and mixing of ingredients.

products.name: Cast Iron WH Fry Pan
products.description: Large frying pan with white handle
products.detailedDescription: Spacious frying surface with premium white handle design for comfortable cooking of larger portions. The generous size makes it perfect for family meals and entertaining.

products.name: Cast Iron WH Fry Pan
products.detailedDescription: Perfect portion size for individuals or couples with the same premium white handle comfort and cast iron benefits. The compact size makes it ideal for small kitchens and quick meals.

products.name: Cast Iron WH Grill Pan
products.detailedDescription: Bring restaurant-quality grilling to your home kitchen with our ridged grill pan featuring comfortable white handles. The raised ridges create authentic grill marks while allowing excess fat to drain away for healthier cooking.
features: Ridged cooking surface for grill marks

metadata.imageStructure: Each product has its own folder under images/products/
